## GroupedTableMetadataGathererComponent class

Component that is used for gathering metadata for table with grouped header columns

This is metadata gatherer which works with `GroupedTableColumnComponent` and `HeaderTableGroupComponent`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GroupedTableMetadataGathererComponent<TData = any> implements AfterContentInit, MetadataGatherer<GroupedTableMetadata<BasicTableColumn<TData>>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [metadataChange](./grid.groupedtablemetadatagatherercomponent.metadatachange.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Information that metadata for grid has changed |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getMetadata()](./grid.groupedtablemetadatagatherercomponent.getmetadata.md) |  | Gets current metadata for grid |
|  [ngAfterContentInit()](./grid.groupedtablemetadatagatherercomponent.ngaftercontentinit.md) |  | Called when content was initialized |
